spiritsExplanation:
The workout primarily embodies the 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit with a score of 0.8 due to the music-driven nature and the inclusion of hits from the 80s. The playlist with songs like 'Keep On Movin'' encourages a rhythmic and coordinated movement pattern, closely aligned with the Flow & Rhythm spirit. The session's description, "turn up the tunes and move your body," suggests a focus on music-driven pacing and mind-body connection.

The 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit is also notable with a score of 0.7, influenced by the scenic outdoor setting with the river and bridge in view, as seen in the image. The workout being conducted on a dock fits the criteria of leveraging an outdoor environment, enhancing the adventurous feel.

The inclusion of bodyweight strength elements could slightly imply a 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit, but the main emphasis appears on flowing with the music and the natural setting, hence other spirits were less relevant.
